QueryDefinition.Query:
with npi as ( SELECT distinct pb.npi, max(pb.prov_unique) prov_unique FROM {sc}.provider_bridge pb join {sc}.provider p on pb.prov_unique = p.prov_unique and (p.prov_type is null or prov_type in ('', '1', 'unknown')) group by pb.npi ), dea as ( SELECT distinct pb.dea, max(pb.prov_unique) prov_unique FROM {sc}.provider_bridge pb join {sc}.provider p on pb.prov_unique = p.prov_unique and (p.prov_type is null or prov_type in ('', '1', 'unknown')) group by pb.dea ), prov as ( SELECT distinct pb.prov_unique, pb.prov FROM {sc}.provider_bridge pb join {sc}.provider p on pb.prov_unique = p.prov_unique and (p.prov_type is null or prov_type in ('', '1', 'unknown')) ), rx as ( SELECT rx.patid as PERSON_ID, COALESCE(prov.prov_unique, npi.prov_unique, dea.prov_unique, 0) as PROVIDER_ID, rx.pharm as CARE_SITE_ID, CASE WHEN mail_ind = 'Y' THEN 38004345 when spclt_ind = 'Y' THEN 38004348 ELSE 581458 END AS VISIT_DETAIL_CONCEPT_ID, fill_dt as START_DATE, quantity, rfl_nbr, CASE WHEN mail_ind = 'Y' THEN 38000176 ELSE 38000175 END AS TYPE_CONCEPT_ID, pat_planid, clmid, CASE WHEN days_sup < 0 THEN 0 WHEN days_sup > 365 THEN 365 WHEN days_sup IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE days_sup END AS DAYS_SUPPLY, ndc DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE, SUBSTRING(ndc,1,9) DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE_9 FROM {sc}.rx_claims rx JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND rx.patid = ch.PERSON_ID left join prov on prov.prov = prescriber_prov left join npi on prov.prov_unique is null and rx.npi != '' and rx.npi is not null and npi.npi = rx.npi left join dea on prov.prov_unique is null and npi.prov_unique is null and dea.dea = rx.dea )
select * from rx order by PERSON_ID
